item.title: Start to end Billing using Stripe, Cashier and Laravel 5.1
item.description: Start to end Billing and Laravel As usual the Laravel docs rock but sometimes it is nice to see this from start to end. With that said read those docs first and then come back here. Also the public repo can be seen here Setup your Stripe Yup this is easy. Note the test/live dash board. Super nice to see the different processes. Turn it to test and make your plans.
